name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Arnold KING, Appellant

judges: Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Arnold KING, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The petition to amend the notice of appeal is hereby granted.
Judgments of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph Bongiovanni, III, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael L. Turner, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
456 A.2d 984
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Arnold KING, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 28, 1983.
Decided March 11, 1983.
Joseph Bongiovanni, III, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael L. Turner, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before ROBERTS, C.J., and NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, HUTCHINSON and ZAPPALA, JJ.
